file_content.text: [Lord Zaron's tablets have been recovered. There is nothing that can be done for his slave.]
[Displaying Lord Zaron's message drained the datapad's power. It is silent and unresponsive.]
[This datapad is low on power. It automatically displays a message.]
The Nightmare Lands drive many insane. We blame the darkness. But these madmen move with purpose.
They enter places no one has walked, recover items thought forever lost. These items are of great value.
The ancient tablets they unearth must contain invaluable secrets. You will find these tablets, apprentice.
Deliver the tablets to the drop spot, and I will send your expenses for the month. Do not fail me.
[The datapad appears to be low on power. The screen flickers and dies. No message is displayed.]
